tool.name: PopulateMapUnitConfidence

param.name: listFCsToWorkOn
param.displayname: Coma Delimited List of Feature Classes:
param.dialogReference: A come separated list of feature classes to work on. These feature classes must have the fields "MapUnit" and "Identity Confidence".

tool.summary: This tool populates the IndentityConfidence field based on the presence or absence of a question mark in the MapUnit field of a GEMS database. By default it only works on feature classes named "MapUnitPolys" or "MapUnitPoints", but other feature classes to be considered can be specified.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool populates the IndentityConfidence field based on the presence or absence of a question mark in the MapUnit field of a GEMS database. By default it only works on feature classes named "MapUnitPolys" or "MapUnitPoints", but other feature classes to be considered can be specified.
